subject: Baseball
Citi Field (NYC)
Yankee Stadium (NYC)
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: The Mets and the Yankees failed to sell about 5,000 tickets — including some of the priciest seats — to each of their first few games after last week’s openers.
snippet: The Mets and the Yankees failed to sell about 5,000 tickets — including some of the priciest seats — to each of their first few games after last week’s openers.
